title: AMP Capital wins Macarthur Wind Farm auction
text:
Australian asset manager AMP Capital is set to buy a 50 per cent stake in Macarthur Wind Farm for $880 million.

AMP Capital will buy the stake from Malaysia's Malakoff Corporation, which put its investment up for sale earlier this year and hired Rothschild to run an auction.

Street Talk. Photo: Morris MacMatzen

It is understood the $880 million deal was signed overnight.

The deal is expected to be announced on Wednesday.

AMP Capital will make the investment on behalf of investors in its AMP Capital Community Infrastructure Fund (CommIF) and the AMP Capital Core Infrastructure Fund (CIF).
description: Australian asset manager AMP Capital is set to buy a 50 per cent stake in Macarthur Wind Farm for $880 million.
